html: Iran continues to play the troublemaker in the region, foment unrest and threaten its neighbors. Deal or no deal, we need to continue to apply pressure on Iran to change its behavior and to ensure that Iran does not threaten U.S. security and that of our allies.

html: My standard remains the same: any deal must prevent Iran from developing nuclear weapons & ballistic missile technology. I was skeptical from the outset whether the Iran deal accomplished this. I voted with the House to disapprove it in 2015, & I support the president’s decision.
text: My standard remains the same: any deal must prevent Iran from developing nuclear weapons & ballistic missile technology. I was skeptical from the outset whether the Iran deal accomplished this. I voted with the House to disapprove it in 2015, & I support the president’s decision.

html: I commend the work of Robert Mueller and his investigation, and I look forward to a complete and speedy end so Americans know the facts regarding Russian attempts to undermine trust in our democratic institutions.
text: I commend the work of Robert Mueller and his investigation, and I look forward to a complete and speedy end so Americans know the facts regarding Russian attempts to undermine trust in our democratic institutions.

html: It is time those involved pay the price. I welcome these indictments and the demonstration of the due process provided by our judicial system that is systematically denied to Russian citizens.
text: It is time those involved pay the price. I welcome these indictments and the demonstration of the due process provided by our judicial system that is systematically denied to Russian citizens.

html: Our law enforcement and intelligence services confirm that Russian individuals and entities have engaged in a long-running effort to interfere in our electoral process in a malicious attempt to undermine our democracy and discredit the United States on the world stage.
